website_summaries.verdict: A durable riding lawn mower battery that can be a more affordable option, depending on your power needs.
pros: This battery is specifically designed to be shock- and vibration-resistant
It offers a deep discharge recovery to help keep the battery functional when you run it down further than intended
With proper care, this model can last up to 5 years
cons: Although it should be sufficient for most riding mowers, be aware that this battery only offers 200 CCA

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Be More Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, arrived on time, and worked like a charm without needing to be charged at all! Very Pleased and highly recommend this battery!
customer_reviews.author: essolunapapa

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding, super pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Been having trouble with my craftsman mower for a year it's only 2 years old but needed a vehicle jump start every week... rolled the dice that the battery was the issue and right off the bat, started right up the way it should. Such a relief... once of the best buys I've had all year. Super easy to install, well packaged and shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: Zombiequest

customer_reviews.title: Measurements were not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Did not measure same size as my old battery once arrived (1/2 cm bigger) and will not fit into my lawn mower. Since this is a no return feature I am out the money I spent on this battery
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: I would not hesitate to buy again , highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received went dead a couple of times? I contacted the company and they apologized and sent me a new one right away . This proves to me they are a class act and produce a quality product . Also they have one of the best warranties that I came across in my research.
customer_reviews.author: ALBERT M.

customer_reviews.title: The battery is perfect !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This battery was perfect.......it works great.....it was very easy to install ....I put in our riding lawnmower ... I luv it !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Nice deal
customer_reviews.text: Wish it were a little cheaper but it works great after 6 uses. Starts just as well as stock battery. It was slightly taller for my Husqvarna riding mower but it didn't prevent the plastic clips from holding it down at all. Glad it came with screws/nuts because I lost one from stock.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Just received and installed
customer_reviews.text: Just received and installed this and it had a full charge and started my mower right up. I bought this battery because it has great reviews and I'm tired of buying these cheap $20 batteries at my local farm and home and only getting a year out of them. Hoping I get what I pay for with this battery. I will use a battery tender during winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi M.

customer_reviews.title: Worked right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Worked right out of the box. it's worked all summer so far.I would by it again if I need one.
customer_reviews.author: Nick K.

customer_reviews.title: better than the factory battery
customer_reviews.text: as far as I can see this holds up much better and has stronger kick than the factory battery I replaced with it
customer_reviews.author: Jindrich Zapletal

customer_reviews.title: Fits and works
customer_reviews.text: The terminals are reversed, but it fits and works, so all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Mckelvain

customer_reviews.title: It fits exactly in the battery box. No idea about longevity.
customer_reviews.text: Exact drop in replacement for the OEM Diehard battery in my Craftsman lawn tractor.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelJT

customer_reviews.title: Holds a charge very well
customer_reviews.text: These hold a charge much better than the batteries you get at auto zone.
customer_reviews.author: doubleganger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Battery and Excellent Service
customer_reviews.text: Battery was a exact fit. Couldn't be more happy with the Service and fast Shipping ....
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on my Craftsman riding mower
customer_reviews.text: Started my mower after setting without being started for several winter months
customer_reviews.author: Ronp30014

customer_reviews.title: Very strong batter6
customer_reviews.text: This battery will turn the engine without any hesitation unlike the other batteries I've bought for several years. This seems to be a great battery.
customer_reviews.author: Luther S.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Can’t comment on longevity...only had in use for few months...good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great Value !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy Duty battery for the price. Definitely would recommend !!
customer_reviews.author: David C. Hollen

customer_reviews.title: So far long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to have a backup ready when the first discharges, Both were charged up and I have used one of them every day for about 30 minutes a day over two weeks. i have had no need to use the second since the first is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made battery
customer_reviews.text: We just received the battery and it appears to be a well made and easy to install battery. We will have to wait to determine longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy A Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Came ready to go out of box
customer_reviews.text: It came gully charged and worked immediately. No problems whatsoever. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Weldon Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Fine battery
customer_reviews.text: Battery worked fine and it has a carrying handle to make installation easier. It is completely sealed - no need to add water.
customer_reviews.author: John Carr

customer_reviews.title: battery
customer_reviews.text: Have not had it but 2 weeks. Working well .
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE W.

customer_reviews.title: It's all good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this battery a while back at a different vendor but want to recommend it where I see it. It is exactly as described but in my opinion holds power better than past batteries in our older mower, and while it could be wishful thinking the mower seems to fire louder and to be more powerful. In any event, for us this battery was a good find at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Appalachian Son

product_meta.title: Mighty Max Battery ML-U1 12V 200CCA Battery for Craftsman 25780 Lawn Tractor and Mower Brand Product
product_meta.description:
This ML-U1-CCA 12 volts 200 CCA absorbed glass mat (AGM) battery is made with the highest quality pure virgin lead (99.99%) to create a long lasting, durable power source for any machinery requiring a cold cranking power source.
The advanced pure lead technology, lower internal resistance and increased plate compression give this battery a longer service life, better deep cycling and overall quicker start-ups for all your lawn and garden machinery. The clever, non-spillable design allows the battery to sit and function in virtually any position increasing your opportunity for ease of mounting. The tough AGM separators and high cell composition increase this batteryâ€s vibration resistance up to 20 times more than that of conventional batteries making it perfect for all your lawn and garden machinery.
Specifications of the ML-U1-CCA Battery

Voltage: 12 Volt
CCA: 200
CA: 280
Chemistry: SLA, AGM
Terminal: Nut & Bolt

Battery Dimensions:7.75 in x 5.11 in x 6.25 in
Weight: 12.89 Lbs

Warranty:
1 Year
Genuine Mighty Max battery Product
feature_bullets: ML-U1 is a 12V 200 Cold Cranking Amps (CCA) Sealed Lead Acid (SLA) Battery
Dimensions: 7.75 inches x 5.11 inches x 6.25 inches. Polarity: Positive on Right, Negative on Left. Listing is for the Battery and Screws only. No wire harness or mounting accessories included.
SLA / AGM spill proof battery has a characteristic of high discharge rate, wide operating temperatures, long service life and deep discharge recover.
Rechargeable battery that can be mounted in any position, resists shocks and vibration. Long lasting high performance in high and low temperatures.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars96 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
